test.create_query: CREATE TABLE str_sort (a String, b UInt64, c FixedString(5), d String ) ENGINE = Memory
test.fill_query: INSERT INTO str_sort SELECT ('number key ' || toString(number % 400)) AS a, number % 20 AS b, ('ABCD' || toString(rand()%10)) as c, toString(rand() % 100000) as d FROM numbers(1e7)
test.query: SELECT a, b FROM str_sort ORDER BY a, b FORMAT Null
SELECT b, c FROM str_sort ORDER BY b, c FORMAT Null
SELECT a, d FROM str_sort ORDER BY c, d FORMAT Null
